_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualities a wilderness monk who has come: Respect and reverence for his spiritual companions
Knowledge of even the supplementary regulations
Not entering the village too early or returning too late in the day
Not socializing with families before or after the meal
Being easy to admonish, with good friends
Making an effort to learn the teaching and training
Practicing meditation to realize the peaceful liberations that are formless, transcending form
Practicing meditation to realize the superhuman state.
Questions that may be asked of a wildern: Question about the teaching and training
